events.message: The customer reported a vehicle collision that occurred on the highway involving their car and another vehicle.
The claim was categorised under Auto Accident due to keywords such as collision and vehicle damage reported by the claimant.
An agent specialized in auto insurance claims was assigned to handle the case to ensure expert attention.
The claimant received an acknowledgment confirming that their auto accident claim was officially received and logged.
Documents such as police reports, photos of damaged vehicle, and driver’s license were requested to support the claim.
The customer submitted all requested documents promptly including an official police report and vehicle repair estimates.
A thorough investigation began to verify the circumstances of the collision and assess the extent of vehicle damages.
The investigation concluded, confirming the fault and validating the damages claimed on the vehicle in the accident.
A settlement offer was proposed to the customer based on investigation findings and documented vehicle repair costs.
The claimant expressed satisfaction with the proposed settlement and appreciated the prompt handling of their claim.
After acceptance of the settlement, the claim was approved, confirming that reimbursement will be processed shortly.
The payment for the vehicle repairs was issued to the customer’s bank account, completing the financial obligations.
The claim was officially closed following payment issuance, and the customer was informed with closure confirmation.
All claim documents and investigation reports were archived securely for future reference and compliance purposes.
